title: slicetheice.apk
description:
Take Scrappy on this puzzling journey across snowy terrains, grasslands and underwater reefs and do him an extremely simple favour - just SLICE THE ICE!

A plane has just crashed under mysterious circumstances somewhere in the Arctic. Fully loaded with yellow rubber ducks!
The event has been noted by Scrappy, a bored-to-death blue polar weasel. In an heroic act he decides to rescue the poor ducks. This game is about his mission.

Slice the ice, collect the ducks and acorns, and take the help of various objects and animals to guide the yellow rubber ducks to Scrappy in this vibrant, brain-teasing and adorable physics-based puzzler!

Download NOW and experience a slice of all these amazing features:
